title: Branding and Logo Design
subtitle: Logo design for Boston Group for Psychoanalytic Studies

paragraphs: This is a rebranding exercise to help the Boston Group for Psychoanalytic Studies to implement a new logo. Working with a group of stakeholders, I first conducted a questionnaire understanding how they perceived the organization and its brand. Through the exercise I first determine with the client the most symbolic visual imageries for the group are a helix and a globe, representing the psychoanalytic and international aspects of this organization. I designed and tested using a palette green, blue and ruby red, that draws emotional connections to their values, which are calming, authoritative, global, academic and prestigious.

Psychoanalytic Studies is the academic discipline which is concerned with teaching and research about psychoanalytic theory and practice. Boston Group for Psychoanalytic Studies is a nonprofit educational organization which sponsors seminars, lectures, small group clinical discussions and international conferences.
